participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about his interests, Lucas has a playful and enthusiastic demeanor.
participant_1.background: i played football for a division a college. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Megan is outgoing and enjoys the finer things in life, often seen as a social butterfly.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.
